/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The sky is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, creating a serene backdrop for the urban landscape below.

On either side of the street, tall buildings rise, their facades adorned with vibrant graffiti that adds a splash of color to the otherwise monochrome cityscape. The buildings' towering presence is accentuated by the low-angle view, making them appear even more imposing.

The street itself is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze, providing a stark contrast to the concrete structures. Power lines crisscross above, forming an intricate web that mirrors the complexity of the city's infrastructure.

The image is bathed in the soft light of day, casting long shadows and highlighting the textures of the buildings and trees. Despite the bustling city environment, there's a sense of tranquility that pervades the scene, perhaps a testament to the harmonious coexistence of nature and urban development in Beijing.
